trends: There have been no other sightings in West Point
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to the movies with my wife. We live in King and Queen county. Drove across the newly constructed bridge in between King William And New Kent Co. And thats when we saw a total of 24 vertical jet vapor trails. These appeared all around in 360 degrees. I know it sounds ridiculous, but it looked like missles being launched! That in itself was strange,but as we turned down the next road I saw a detailed dark object against the blue evening sky. It was nowhere near the previous things I described by the way. The object then pulsed an orange light,then moved slowly in an eliptical fashion then sped off. The previous objects I described continued until dark and at no time did I observe ANY lights at all as per faa regulation. This is the most interesting thing I have EVER observed in the sky. I cant belive I saw A ufo! If anyone else saw this please report!
Summary: metallic orblike eliptical movement pulsed orange light dashed off!
